alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and northern Herkimer Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Carthage to near Forestport. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, Inlet, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Big Moose, Nicks Lake Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, McKeever, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Alger Island Public Campground, Little Rapids, Beaver River, Minnehaha, Carter Station, Quaker Beach, First Lake, Partlow and Robinwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
